name: Mad Candy Max: Match Three Or More Candies Tap Boom Game
name_original: Mad Candy Max: Match Three Or More Candies Tap Boom Game
description:
Welcome to Mad Candy Max.
If you like Candies and Match-3 Puzzle Game, you will love Mad Candy Max.
Mad Candy Max is an innovation Match-3 or more game.
Mad Candy Max is an interactive and fun Match-3 Puzzle game for people in all ages.

Test your matching skills in this monster candy exciting, ultra addictive jewel like gem matching game, featuring multiple heroes fun modes. Use awesome power-ups to help you along, and play through numerous gem packed levels as you try your hardest to master the game.

You also need to find those 3-Matches with the most AWESOME sweet puzzle cookie and rainbow lollipop candy chain reactions. Be lost in hours of FUN as you try to travel through the hundreds of levels and different themes that await you.

Play through over +400 levels of lollipop candy & chocolate theme collecting craziness!

- Match at least three pieces of candy to pop them and add them to your collection
- Collect all the candies of a certain rainbow color of sugar cupcake to win!
- Really enjoy playing this game & find this game very challenging at times
- The game is fun and a great time waster
- Really enjoyable game with many hours of fun

The whole game is completely free. No option to buy anything.
